column2:
```r
measure_tbl <- data_frame(pred = predict(model_results[[1, 'model']], newdata=transactions),
                          appliance_purchase = transactions$appliance_purchase) %>%
  mutate(prediction_group = cut2(pred, g = 20)) %>%
  group_by(prediction_group_id = 20 + 1 + desc(prediction_group),
           prediction_group) %>%
  summarise(appliance_purchasers = sum(appliance_purchase)) %>%
  ungroup %>%
  mutate(appliance_purchasers_total = cumsum(appliance_purchasers))
measure_tbl %>%
  select(prediction_group_id, appliance_purchasers, appliance_purchasers_total) %>%
  print(n=20)
```
